title: ConAgra Foods To Face Criminal Charge For 2007 Peanut Butter Recall
teaser: A subsidiary of ConAgra Foods is poised to plead guilty to a criminal charge and pay the largest-ever criminal fine in a food safety case after an outbreak in its peanut butter sickened at least 625 people in 47 states.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
